languages.text: "Докажи мне, что твое откровение было истинным. Подвергни свою веру испытанию".
"Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."
languages.original_text: "Докажи мне, что твое откровение было истинным. Подвергни свою веру испытанию".

traits.locale_text: "Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."
"Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."
"Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."
"Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."
"Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."
"Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."

languages.text: « Prouvez-moi que votre révélation était bien réelle en mettant votre foi à l'épreuve. »
languages.original_text: "Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."

traits.locale_text: « Prouvez-moi que votre révélation était bien réelle en mettant votre foi à l'épreuve. »

languages.text: «Demuéstreme que su epifanía fue real. Ponga a prueba su fe».
languages.original_text: "Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."

traits.locale_text: «Demuéstreme que su epifanía fue real. Ponga a prueba su fe».

languages.text: “向我证明你的顿悟都是真的吧，我要考验一下你的信仰。”
languages.original_text: "Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."

traits.locale_text: “向我证明你的顿悟都是真的吧，我要考验一下你的信仰。”

languages.text: 「お前の天啓を証明しろ。お前の信仰を試してやる」
languages.original_text: "Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の天啓を証明しろ。お前の信仰を試してやる」

languages.text: "Beweist mir, dass Eure Erleuchtung echt war. Stellt Euren Glauben auf die Probe."
languages.original_text: "Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."

traits.locale_text: "Beweist mir, dass Eure Erleuchtung echt war. Stellt Euren Glauben auf die Probe."

languages.text: "Yaşadığın aydınlanmanın gerçek olduğunu bana kanıtla. İnancını teste tabi tut."
languages.original_text: "Prove to me that your epiphany was real. Put your faith to the test."
